post.author: kevin5475845
post.body: ok i downloaded blender and python and installed both but when i am gonna run blender it says that it cant find python and blender closes itself i need blender because i want my own stuff in d3.. i make stuff in truespace but theere is nothing for truespace so i save my file to a file format i can open with blender then i convert blender thing so i can have them in truespace so i really need help

post.author: kit89
post.body:
Whats version of python are you installing?

It must be python 2.4

Also Blender shouldn't crash for not having python it just means that python support for certain things is not there.
